titleStmt.title: The new model of a part of the militia of the kingdom of Scotland, consisiting of five thousand foot, and five hundred horse ; with the instructions to the commissioners of the militia.

publicationStmt.publisher: By the heir of Andrew Anderson,

notesStmt.note: Imprint lacking. Publication information from Wing (2nd ed.).

Reproduction of original in: Sutro Library.
